title: Karamja Box Company

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Karamja Box Company is a box manufacturer responsible for producing crates and boxes, as well as buttons and damaged armour and weaponry.[1] When examining boxes in Nardah, it is revealed that they are manufactured by the Karamja Box Company.

content:
The Karamja Box Company is a box manufacturer responsible for producing crates and boxes, as well as buttons and damaged armour and weaponry.[1] When examining boxes in Nardah, it is revealed that they are manufactured by the Karamja Box Company.

In an issue of the Postbag from the Hedge, the company director, Flatpak Jones, states that the company no longer operate from Karamja but retained its original name.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The company's manufacturing buttons, damaged armour and so on is a reference to how crates used to yield such items when searched.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Postbag 8 - "Transcript:Pull the udder one!", Letter 1, by Flatpak Jones. Old School RuneScape Postbags from the Hedge.
rawContent:
The '''Karamja Box Company''' is a box manufacturer responsible for producing [[crate]]s and [[boxes]], as well as buttons and damaged armour and weaponry.{{CitePostbag|issue=8|letter=Letter 1|author=Flatpak Jones}} When examining boxes in [[Nardah]], it is revealed that they are manufactured by the Karamja Box Company.

In an issue of the [[Postbag from the Hedge]], the company director, [[Flatpak Jones]], states that the company no longer operate from [[Karamja]] but retained its original name.

==Trivia==
*The company's manufacturing buttons, [[damaged armour]] and so on is a reference to how crates used to yield such items when searched.
